content.text:
I don't have the ability to search the web directly. However, based on my knowledge, the last US penny minted was in 2022.

The answer in yyyy-mm-dd format is: **2022-12-31**

Note: The US Mint stopped penny production in 2022, with the last pennies being minted that year. However, if you need the exact date of the final penny minting, you may want to verify this with the US Mint's official website, as I cannot search the web to confirm the specific date.
